sense.def:
Stvari, ki so
scattered
, so raztresene po nekem območju in daleč narazen med seboj.

seg.quote: We drove over the debris scattered across the streets.
The old people could not visit their scattered families.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
scattered with a lot of small things
, je po tistem raztresenih veliko drobnih stvari.

seg.quote: Her hair was scattered with pollen.
